title: Please fix the client
body:
Every action I take in the client is delayed by like 20 seconds, whether it be sending out game invites or going to any page or changing masteries/rune pages... it's ridiculous. The lobbies also take an eternity to load. Low spec mode made things a bit better but they're still pretty bad and still laggy... :(

Hopefully the client is resolved soon. I never had these issues with the other client.
